website_summaries.verdict: A lightweight option that de-frizzes, moisturizes, and is gentle enough for every day use.

customer_reviews.title: Love this conditioner!
customer_reviews.text: My hair is super thick and gets frizzy, even after I use my flat iron. But once I started using this leave-in spray, I have noticed a big change! My hair is a lot softer, and it doesn't frizz nearly as much! Plus, the smell is really nice. It is a good sized bottle, so even with very frequent use, it goes a long way! I will definitely buy this again!
